actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

official_title: To provide locality pay to Federal employees working overseas under domestic teleworking agreements, and for other purposes.
short_title: Civil Service Federal Employee Serving Overseas Pay Equity Act

summary.text:
Civil Service Federal Employee Serving Overseas Pay Equity Act

This bill provides for locality pay for federal employees who are teleworking overseas under a Domestic Employee Teleworking Overseas agreement, specifically the locality pay for where they would have been working in the United States or what they would receive as a member of the Foreign Service, whichever is lower.

titles.title: Civil Service Federal Employee Serving Overseas Pay Equity Act
